languages.text: Научил{mf||а} Номос, что помогать людям нет смысла, когда можно ими повелевать.
Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.
languages.original_text: Научил{mf||а} Номос, что помогать людям нет смысла, когда можно ими повелевать.

traits.locale_text: Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.
Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.
Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.
Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.
Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.

languages.text: 你教导诺莫斯，只要对别人下命令就好，帮助他们毫无意义。
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.

traits.locale_text: 你教导诺莫斯，只要对别人下命令就好，帮助他们毫无意义。

languages.text: Nomos beigebracht, dass es zwecklos ist, jemandem zu helfen, wenn man ihn stattdessen auch befehligen kann.
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.

traits.locale_text: Nomos beigebracht, dass es zwecklos ist, jemandem zu helfen, wenn man ihn stattdessen auch befehligen kann.

languages.text: Vous avez enseigné à Nomos qu'il est inutile d'aider les gens quand on peut les commander.
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez enseigné à Nomos qu'il est inutile d'aider les gens quand on peut les commander.

languages.text: Has enseñado a Nomos que no sirve de nada ayudar a la gente cuando puedes darles órdenes.
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.

traits.locale_text: Has enseñado a Nomos que no sirve de nada ayudar a la gente cuando puedes darles órdenes.

languages.text: 人に命令することができるのであれば、人を助けることに意味はないことをノモスに教えた。
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.

traits.locale_text: 人に命令することができるのであれば、人を助けることに意味はないことをノモスに教えた。

languages.text: Nomos'a, insanları komuta edebilecekken yardım etmenin bir anlamı olmadığını öğrettin.
languages.original_text: Taught Nomos that there is no point in helping people when one can command them.

traits.locale_text: Nomos'a, insanlara komuta edebilecekken yardım etmenin bir anlamı olmadığını öğrettin.
